minMax.name: Min Max
minMax.createDescription: Creates a Min Max Detector which periodicly checks if a target value is between a given minimum and maximum.

slidingWindow.name: Sliding Window
slidingWindow.createDescription: Creates a Sliding Window Detector which periodicly aggregates the target values in a timeframe and checks if the result value exceeds or is below a threshhold.

detectorList.subtitle: Displays all detectors of the current client.
